trans-unit.source: Indicates the current state of the service.
trans-unit.target: Indica o estado atual do serviço.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus> enumeration is used by an instance of the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> class to indicate whether an existing service is running, stopped, paused, or whether a Start, Stop, Pause, or Continue command is pending.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus> enumeração é usada por uma instância de <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> classe para indicar se um serviço existente está em execução, parada, pausada ou se um Iniciar, parar, pausar ou continuar comando está pendente.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> class to check the current status of the TelNet service.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa a <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> classe para verificar o status atual do serviço TelNet.

trans-unit.source: If the service is stopped, the example starts the service.
trans-unit.target: Se o serviço for interrompido, o exemplo inicia o serviço.

trans-unit.source: If the service is running, the example stops the service.
trans-unit.target: Se o serviço está em execução, o exemplo interrompe o serviço.

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the Win32 <see langword="SERVICE_CONTINUE_PENDING" /> constant, which is defined as 0x00000005.
trans-unit.target: Isso corresponde à constante <see langword="SERVICE_CONTINUE_PENDING" /> Win32, que é definida como 0x00000005.

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the Win32 <see langword="SERVICE_PAUSED" /> constant, which is defined as 0x00000007.
trans-unit.target: Isso corresponde à constante <see langword="SERVICE_PAUSED" /> Win32, que é definida como 0x00000007.

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the Win32 <see langword="SERVICE_PAUSE_PENDING" /> constant, which is defined as 0x00000006.
trans-unit.target: Isso corresponde à constante <see langword="SERVICE_PAUSE_PENDING" /> Win32, que é definida como 0x00000006.

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the Win32 <see langword="SERVICE_RUNNING" /> constant, which is defined as 0x00000004.
trans-unit.target: Isso corresponde à constante <see langword="SERVICE_RUNNING" /> Win32, que é definida como 0x00000004.

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the Win32 <see langword="SERVICE_START_PENDING" /> constant, which is defined as 0x00000002.
trans-unit.target: Isso corresponde à constante <see langword="SERVICE_START_PENDING" /> Win32, que é definida como 0x00000002.

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the Win32 <see langword="SERVICE_STOPPED" /> constant, which is defined as 0x00000001.
trans-unit.target: Isso corresponde à constante <see langword="SERVICE_STOPPED" /> Win32, que é definida como 0x00000001.

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the Win32 <see langword="SERVICE_STOP_PENDING" /> constant, which is defined as 0x00000003.
trans-unit.target: Isso corresponde à constante <see langword="SERVICE_STOP_PENDING" /> Win32, que é definida como 0x00000003.
